name: Star Fox 64: Survival
overview:
Despite its name, Star Fox 64: Survival has very little to do with Star Fox 64. It’s actually a mod of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time, but with Fox McCloud as the main character.

Created by Kasper, Zel and Kaze, this mod reworks Ocarina of Time into a horde mini-game. Zel and Kaze previously worked on another Ocarina of Time mod, The Legend of Zelda: The Missing Link.
